text:
The Coney Island Mermaid parade is an annual
spectacle celebrating the beginning of the

Thousands converge to watch performers dancing
and singing.

It was mostly a happy event; however, a select
few decided to brawl instead.

With perfect weather we marveled at the extraordinary
and often times risque marine costumes.

If you're in New York in June definitely consider
going to the Mermaid Parade.

I promise you that you won't be the only one
there.
